item.title: Move the chat area out of sight
item.description: Seeing people submit solutions on the 500 pointer when I'm about to open it makes me terribly nervous.

item.title: Understand the problem
item.description: Always understand what the problem is and how the examples work.

item.title: Find a solution on paper
item.description: Find a solution on paper and write it down using pseudocode. This is very important, it greatly increases coding time...

item.title: Code your solution
item.description: Take your time, take doubts serious. Think it through before submitting. On longer numbers or words in the problem statement check for typos. Test for border cases like 0, "" max and min values.

item.title: Keep cool during challenge phase
item.description: Keep cool, consider what you have, remember you can fail system test on solutions you think are ok. Don't get into the challenge fever, do no guessed, head over heels challenges.

item.title: Caveats: Parens, Doubles, API
item.description: Be careful about parens (better more than less, for readability) and doubles , don't forget casting or using double literals. Don't forget the API : Comparable, arraycopy, split, Set, addAll, binarySearch and even stuff like Rectangle and Point.
